title: An Australian survey of health professionals' perceptions of use and usefulness of electronic medical records in hospitalised children's pain care
details: N Pope, J Keyser, D Crellin, G Palmer, M South… - Journal of Child Health Care, 2024
abstract: Pain in hospitalised children is common, yet inadequately treated. Electronic medical records (EMRs) can improve care quality and outcomes during hospitalisation. Little is known about how clinicians use EMRs in caring for children with pain. This …
